Stop-loss strategy: Set stop loss at 985 NTD, review and adjust every 3 months, sell if the stock price falls below the stop loss or if ROE and ROA show significant decline.
Set stop loss at 10% below the purchase price and adjust it to break-even when the stock price rises by 20%.
Trailing stop loss with a 10% drop from the highest price, or a fixed stop loss at 950 NTD
Set a stop-loss order at 10% below the current price and adjust it to 5% below the current price if the stock price rises by 20% within the first 6 months.
